title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, January 23, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of biochemist and pharmacologist Gertrude B. Elion (1918), who developed drugs to treat leukemia, malaria, herpes, and AIDS.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of biochemist and pharmacologist Gertrude B. Elion (1918), who developed drugs to treat leukemia, malaria, herpes, and AIDS.
